<div id="posts-category-filters" class="d-flex flex-wrap align-items-center gap-2 mb-3" role="group" aria-label="Filter posts by category"></div>

::: {#posts}
:::

Looking for event announcements and event pages? See: [Events](../events/index.qmd)

::: {.callout-note}
Reposts are clearly marked and link back to their original publication.
:::

<script>
window.document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const filterContainer = window.document.getElementById("posts-category-filters");
  if (!filterContainer) {
    return;
  }

  const encodeCategory = (category) => window.btoa(window.encodeURIComponent(category));

  const setActiveButton = (category) => {
    const buttons = filterContainer.querySelectorAll("button[data-category]");
    for (const button of buttons) {
      const isActive = (button.getAttribute("data-category") || "") === category;
      button.classList.toggle("active", isActive);
      button.setAttribute("aria-pressed", String(isActive));
    }
  };

  const getCategoryFromHash = () => {
    const rawHash = window.location.hash.startsWith("#")
      ? window.location.hash.slice(1)
      : window.location.hash;
    if (!rawHash) {
      return "";
    }
    const params = new window.URLSearchParams(rawHash);
    return params.get("category") || "";
  };

  const createCategoryButton = (category, isActive) => {
    const button = window.document.createElement("button");
    button.type = "button";
    button.className = "btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary";
    if (isActive) {
      button.classList.add("active");
    }
    button.setAttribute("data-category", category);
    button.setAttribute("aria-pressed", String(isActive));
    button.textContent = category || "All categories";
    return button;
  };

  filterContainer.appendChild(createCategoryButton("", true));

  const listingCategories = Array.from(
    window.document.querySelectorAll("#listing-posts .listing-category")
  )
    .map((el) => el.textContent ? el.textContent.trim() : "")
    .filter((value) => value.length > 0);

  const uniqueCategories = Array.from(new Set(listingCategories)).sort((a, b) =>
    a.localeCompare(b)
  );

  for (const category of uniqueCategories) {
    filterContainer.appendChild(createCategoryButton(category, false));
  }

  filterContainer.addEventListener("click", function (event) {
    const target = event.target;
    if (!(target instanceof window.HTMLButtonElement)) {
      return;
    }
    const category = target.getAttribute("data-category") || "";
    if (typeof window.quartoListingCategory === "function") {
      window.quartoListingCategory(encodeCategory(category));
    }
  });

  if (typeof window.quartoListingCategory === "function") {
    const originalQuartoListingCategory = window.quartoListingCategory;
    window.quartoListingCategory = function (encodedCategory) {
      originalQuartoListingCategory(encodedCategory);
      let decodedCategory = "";
      try {
        decodedCategory = window.decodeURIComponent(window.atob(encodedCategory || ""));
      } catch (_error) {
        decodedCategory = "";
      }
      setActiveButton(decodedCategory);
    };
  }

  setActiveButton(getCategoryFromHash());
});
</script>
